body: Hello, I don't really know where to start; however, this is a thread where I'd like to address the mistakes that I've committed in the last few days. I've possibly been guilty of bringing toxicity towards the community and being a total dickhead to some individuals in this community. I'd like to dearly apologise to the people that I've affected. I don't know where this sudden change of attitude and personality has come from, but I didn't notice it until now. I've been getting T R I G G E R E D quite easily lately and unable to control it; therefore, leading to me releasing unwanted toxicity to certain people. Although I've been toxic, there are a few people who have been dicks and trying to provoke me in to gain a reaction; however, this is not the point nor do I care. This is a thread for me to personally apologise to those whom have been affected and hope they accept my apology with open arms. I won't be posting any replies on this thread because I am sure there some people who don't accept the apology and wish to argue back, but I would like to stay away from that. Thank you and hopefully you accept my apology.

replies.body:
Well, This is unbelieveble.
You're making an apologize post, do you know what that mean?
That mean you should be apologize for your actions.
So please explain me why u say this:
''Although I've been toxic, there are a few people who have been dicks and trying to provoke me in to gain a reaction''
Please stop passing the guilt to others and start loocking more to yourself.
Thanks.
